column1: #BBC Food Ontology by BBC. The Food Ontology is a simple lightweight ontology for publishing data about recipes
column2: including the foods they are made from and the foods they create as well as the diets
column5: courses and occasions they may be suitable for. Whilst it originates in a specific BBC use case
column6: the Food Ontology should be applicable to a wide range of recipe data publishing across the web.
